---
title: An example
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Cleaning

```{r clean}
# remove polluters
clean_cars <- subset(mtcars, mpg > 15)
```

## Analysis

```{r mpg}
summary(clean_cars$mpg)
```

## Fancy Plots

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(clean_cars, aes(mpg, hp)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```
